metadata.Title: CVE-2023-38199 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description: coreruleset (aka OWASP ModSecurity Core Rule Set) through 3.3.4 does not block multiple Content-Type headers, which might allow attackers to bypass a WAF with a crafted payload, aka "Content-Type confusion." This occurs when the web application relies on only the last Content-Type header.

criterions.comment: modsecurity-crs package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
